title: Decrease fossil fuel use decrease atmospheric CO2

content.question: One solution for reducing the amount of atmospheric carbon dioxide would be to

choices.label: increase oceanic temperatures to enhance carbon dioxide uptake
increase the rate of removal of tropical rain forests
decrease the total area of rice paddies
decrease the use of fossil fuels

content.answer: decrease the use of fossil fuels

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
